Hi there! 👋🏽 My name is Nandu and I build software products. When not building a cool side project or sharpening my product/coding skills or wearing my MBA hat, you can find me reading a detective novel in a Berlin café.

I write about building products and the things I've picked up along the way here.

Projects

🎓 Mojo Learning Labs

An online assignment-setting tool for school teachers. Students are invited via email and can join classes that are available for their year group at their school. Teachers can create classes as required and set assignments consisting of various questions (including an image) and answer choices. Students receive grades upon assignment submission and teachers obtain a markbook with student performance and average scores. Built using Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and PostgreSQL.

🎙 SoundBox

SoundBox allows you to search and discover podcasts of interest on Apple’s iTunes.

Built using Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Apple APIs.

🚲 Flying Wheels

Flying Wheels is a marketplace for renting bikes. List bikes online and approve/reject booking requests.

Built using Rails, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and PostgreSQL.
